Container.Name: pydio-cells
Container.Overview: Pydio-cells(https://pydio.com/) is the nextgen file sharing platform for organizations. It is a full rewrite of the Pydio project using the Go language following a micro-service architecture.
Container.Changes:
### 2024-06-27 - Rebasing to Alpine 3.20..
### 2024-03-14 - Rebasing to alpine 3.19. Grpc port defaults to 8080.
### 2023-10-11 - Rebasing to alpine 3.18. Build on alpine edge with Go 1.21.
### 2023-07-06 - Deprecate armhf. As announced here(https://www.linuxserver.io/blog/a-farewell-to-arm-hf)
### 2022-12-01 - Rebasing to alpine 3.17. Adding multi-arch support. Updating cli arguments for v4 compatibility.
### 2022-10-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.16. Upgrading to s6v3. Updating build instructions for v4.
### 2022-09-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.15.
### 2021-01-23 - Rebasing to alpine 3.13.
### 2020-06-01 - Rebasing to alpine 3.12.
### 2020-04-18 - Switch to https as default (only affects new installs). Add self signed cert, add `SERVER_IP` var for adding to cert as SAN. Add optional gRPC port mapping for CellsSync.
### 2020-04-17 - Update compile options, previous release was broken for new installs.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-12-12 - Initial Release

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: All the config files reside here.

Config.Name: EXTERNALURL
Config.Description: The external url you would like to use to access Pydio Cells (Can be https://domain.url or https://IP:PORT).

Config.Name: SERVER_IP
Config.Description: Enter the LAN IP of the docker server. Required for local access by IP, added to self signed cert as SAN (not required if accessing only through reverse proxy).
